text: Mass murders by Nazi Germany can refer to any of the following atrocities committed by Nazi Germany (1933â€“1945): * The Holocaust * * * * * * * * * * * * Roma genocide * * * * * * * * * * * * Polish genocide * Nazi extermination of disabled people ==Related pages== * Antisemitism * Rwandan genocide * Cambodian genocide * Genocides by the Soviet Union ==References== Category:Racism Category:World War II Category:Antisemitism Category:Jewish history Category:History of Germany Category:Antisemitism in Germany Category:Crimes against humanity
title: Mass murders by Nazi Germany
